options.fig.cap: Model of the sampling distribution for the relative risk comparing volunteers assigned to clean wildlife to volunteers assigned to tasks not involving oil exposure.  The model was developed via bootstrapping using 50000 replications.
options.label: recaplanguage-sampling-distribution

options.fig.cap: Null distribution for the relative risk comparing volunteers assigned to clean wildlife to volunteers assigned to tasks not involving oil exposure.  The null hypothesis assumed the two groups of volunteers had a similar risk.  The nul distribution was developed via bootstrapping using 50000 replications.
options.label: recaplanguage-null-distribution
